title: Quantum dot photonic crystal nanocavities: Transition from weak to strong coupling and nonlinear emissions
abstract: Photonic crystal slab nanocavities containing one layer of quantum dots have exhibited: strong coupling to a single quantum dot; tuning by condensation of xenon gas; linewidth broadening due to ensemble dot absorption; gain and lasing.
